reference.title: Date attributes group
reference.shortdesc: The date attributes group includes attributes that take date values, and are defined on metadata elements that work with date information.

dlentry.dd: The date when the information should be retired or refreshed, entered as YYYY-MM-DD, where YYYY is the year, MM is the month from 01 to 12, and DD is the day from 01-31.
The publication or general availability (GA) date, entered as YYYY-MM-DD, where YYYY is the year, MM is the month from 01 to 12, and DD is the day from 01-31.
